name: Rainbow orb
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users dexterity a good amount.
It increases the users constitution incredibly.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence strongly.
It has weak armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a bit.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers a bit faster than avarage.
